actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to rural water and waste disposal grants (deferral No. D 76-72) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 39, 1975 transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of budget authority relating to rural water and waste disposal grants (deferral numbered D 76-72) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 29, 1975, transmitted to the Congress under the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to rural water and waste disposal grants (deferral No. D 76-72) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 39, 1975 transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
